Uses of Class
pe2.Patient

  • Uses of Patient in pe2

    Fields in pe2 with type parameters of type Patient
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected List<Patient>
    Hospital.patientHospitalList
    This list represents the number of patients currently admitted and under treatment in the hospital.The number of this list should not exceed 500.
    protected List<Patient>
    Hospital.physicianPatientList
    This list represents the number of patients assigned to a particular physician.The number of patients in this list should not exceed 8.
    Methods in pe2 that return types with arguments of type Patient
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<Patient>
    Hospital.extractAllPatientDetails()
    This method returns a list of all patients in patientHospitallist in a sorted manner.
    List<Patient>
    Physician.extractPatientDetail()
    This method returns a list of patients assigned to this physician,in a sorted manner.

    Hospital.admitPatient​(Patient newPatient)

    Hospital.dischargePatient​(Patient patient)
    This method discharges a patient once the patient's treatment is completed.
